## Checklist

- [ ] My code follows the project's coding style
- [ ] I have run `golangci-lint run` and addressed any issues
- [ ] I have added/updated tests for my changes
- [ ] I have updated documentation as needed
- [ ] My commits are signed (`git commit -S`)
- [ ] I have read the [CONTRIBUTING.md](CONTRIBUTING.md) guidelines

## Terraform Provider Checklist (if applicable)

- [ ] Resource/data source schema is properly defined
- [ ] CRUD operations are implemented correctly
- [ ] Error handling follows Terraform provider conventions
- [ ] Acceptance tests added for new resources/data sources
